title: can we stop saying ggez
body: like I find it so toxic in my last game a ash sed it like if it was ezy why are you 10 7 12 why did it take 23 min just stop saying it its uncalled for if the game is so ezy end it before 20 and have 0 death then say it other ways don't I and many others find it toxic

no its not its a same that's the mane resone I put this up maybe a rioter would see lol

Hey man,

Check out this post by our Player Behaviour lead

http://ask.fm/RiotLyte/answer/132069455298

> What's the behaviour team's standpoint on "GG EZ" being used? Is it seen as a reportable offense or is it not negative enough? 
> 
> One of our philosophies is to try to not dictate what's OK or not OK in League of Legends unless we absolutely have to. We rely on data like Reports, Honors, social media, the Instant Feedback System and Tribunal to help determine the standards of what the community believes is OK or not OK. This is why all of our systems are intentionally designed to be community-driven, because we want players to have the ability to invest in and shape their own community. In saying this, looking at the data, "GGEZ" is considered a negative term, and is reportable. Players generally agree that the phrase is rarely used in a positive context, and is a pretty sour way to end a match.

ow well ty I did not know it was reportable just ticks me off iv had 50 min games were it goes to a base race and they tern around if they win and say ggez nubs I find it so toxic its like it was a good game and you have to go and be toxic after it like just why
Yeah I agree, and from what we've seen "gg ez" is considered a negative term by a lot of players.
In other words, the banning system says GGEZ when you say GGEZ, stop feeding the bans system guys, he can 3 shot tanks now!

I definitely agree that the word gets very frustrating when it was a close game and they struggled to win and then decide to write GGEZ. I don't get very toxic over it but it does make me a bit mad but i get over it.
Just try not let it get to you.  A couple games after you'll most likely forget about it.  Waste of time stressing over it imo.
Agreed, i find it really rude and unnecessary!

While I don't get mad over it, I just find it idiotic to have some random dude who thinks telling us/them "gg ez" is a great idea after a 40 minute match.

Screw that guy.
English please? Yeah the term GG lost it's purpose a long time ago.
I actually hear it more from the losing team for some reason

I tend to use it when we get stomped. I use it in a more sarcastic tone, when the enemy is in our base at 15 minutes ill be like ggez and pretend I'm the one winning. Or a 50 minute base race, everyone knows it wasnt easy. GGEZ is mostly used in a sarcastic fashion. But I would never use it when its a normal game and I'm winning.
ez game ez life

ggez
